manifest.install: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_pyqad_reply` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `rid` int(10) unsigned DEFAULT '0', `weid` int(11) DEFAULT '0', `title` varchar(50) DEFAULT '', `description` varchar(255) DEFAULT '', `ad_url` varchar(300) DEFAULT '', `ad_urlimg` varchar(300) DEFAULT '', `ad_avatar` varchar(300) DEFAULT '', `ad_title` varchar(50) DEFAULT '', `ad_description` varchar(50) DEFAULT '', `ad_img1` varchar(300) DEFAULT '', `ad_img2` varchar(300) DEFAULT '', `ad_img3` varchar(300) DEFAULT '', `ad_img4` varchar(300) DEFAULT '', `ad_img5` varchar(300) DEFAULT '', `ad_img6` varchar(300) DEFAULT '', `ad_des1` varchar(50) DEFAULT '', `ad_des2` varchar(50) DEFAULT '', `ad_des3` varchar(50) DEFAULT '', `ad_erweima` varchar(300) DEFAULT '', `ad_banner` varchar(300) DEFAULT '', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `indx_rid` (`rid`), KEY `indx_weid` (`weid`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 AUTO_INCREMENT=2 ;
